paper.title: Research on Financial Risk Evaluation of Railway Logistics Based on BP Neural Network Model
paper.abstract: This paper analyzes the risk factors of developing logistics finance business in railway enterprises, identifies the risks from two aspects of external risk and internal risk, and constructs the evaluation index system of railway logistics financial risk. Based on the analysis of BP neural network structure, the training and testing of the sampling samples are carried out by using the neural network, and the risk grade of each influencing factor is obtained, which provides a basis for judging the risk prevention and control of railway logistics finance.

domain_result.justification: The paper focuses on evaluating financial risks in railway logistics using a BP neural network model, which is a direct application in the field of financial risk management. It identifies risk factors, constructs an evaluation index system, and aims to provide a basis for risk prevention and control, all of which are core activities in financial risk management.
